alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 30 at 2:57AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 or more inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills, the Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means heavy snow, strong winds, freezing precipitation, and cold temperatures are possible. Monitor NOAA weather radio, local radio or television, or the Internet for updates on this potentially dangerous storm. Take time to prepare for severe winter conditions before the storm develops.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
